turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Sally. I'm sorry to bother you again, I know you have a lot you're working on today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it's no problem, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am so tired I can hardly think straight. I don't think I slept at all last night. Can you order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You bet. You want me to order it at the new one on Powers and Dublin?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that would be perfect. It's so much closer than the other one, and they have a drive thru.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a Grande Cherry Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. I didn't know they made cherry ones. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, they are really good. I think they are a new item on the menu. Actually, make it a Venti. I don't think a Grande is big enough, haha! I need all the caffeine I can get.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. Would you like whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Um...no...well...actually....yes. Why not? Go big or go home, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right! Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I will charge it to your Starbucks card.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great, because I don't have any cash with me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah I figured, you never do, haha!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sally, you know me so well. What would I do without you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Haha! Ok, your order has been placed, and will be ready for pickup shortly. The receipt is being sent to you by text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Sally, you're a lifesaver. I'll be back in the office in a few minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll hold down the fort until you get back. Drive safe! Bye.
